description:
The Minoseki Academy is one of the schools affiliated to the http://anidb.net/ch95156 [Five Traditions], located in Gifu prefecture. Their jurisdiction covers the whole Chubu region and the Sea of Japan side of Eastern Japan. The school has a positive interaction with the four other schools under the Five Traditions.
The school is led by Academy President http://anidb.net/ch94795 [Hashima Ema].
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Minoseki Gakuin
